item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 18, 2025 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:

25. I deleted all of my email filters (14 points | 30 comments)
26. French modernists were alarmed, inspired by newspaper's voracious dynamism (132 points | 40 comments)
27. Trapped in the dark for 35 hours – Red Sea dive-boat survivors tell of escapes (62 points | 77 comments)

29. Silicon Photonics Breakthrough: The "Last Missing Piece" Now a Reality (3 points | discuss)
